For those who are not able to understand what to do -
Instructions -

1. Open flt-mpgp7.001 using 7Zip.
    If you dont have 7ZIP download it from here -
http://www.7-zip.org/

2.Then extract flt-mgp7.iso file any where you want to ! 

3. Then mount it using DAEMON TOOLS.
    If you dont have daemon tools dowload it from here -
http://www.daemon-tools.cc/eng/products/dtLite

4. Now install the game.

5. Then copy crack from fairlight folder in mounted iso.

6. Enjoy the Game now !!!!!
